member.name: T:Toolkit.FormMain
member.summary: This form is invisible. This form cannot run without parameter. If there is no parameter, the form will be disposed. There is only one parameter of this form. In other words, this form is used to do only one thing: move the hosts file to "X:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts".

member.name: M:Toolkit.FormMain.MoveHostsFile
member.summary: This sub is used to move the '.\hosts' file to "X:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts".

member.name: T:Toolkit.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Toolkit.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Toolkit.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
